title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: TIME, April 22, 2013, CGC 6.0Article: "Mad Money": https://content.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,2140782,00.htmlLOT 2: COINage, Feb/March 2022, CGC 7.5Article: "Bitcoin vs Gold"LOT 3: The New Yorker, Dec 13, 2021, CGC 7.5Article: https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2021/12/13/half-a-billion-in-bitcoin-lost-in-the-dumpLOT 4: India Today, Nov 29, 2021, CGC 8.5Issue/Article: Crypto ManiaSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0008BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: APRIL 29th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
